title: language options in the different regions
body: hey sup guys yes i have an NA account but i also have a latin america north account as well, this is because i live in the caribbean and my ping is better on that server but i think riot should give players the option to choose what language they would like to use because the latin american servers are well spanish but i can only read and speak english so it kinda makes it hard for when i am reading things on the latin american server rather than the NA server............ oh and they should also try to introduce rank games to the latin american servers as well lolz (^_^)

replies.body:
Same here

tbh i might have actually switched servers if i knew how bad the NA ping would get for me after the change (while it was free) i used to get between 120-140 ping after server changes I used to get 150 normal, my net got upgraded and now i can get 135 if i'm lucky. 

Note: I also live in the Caribbean.

Made a new account on the Latin America Server and i get 50 ping on that account but i don't know a lick of Spanish and its no longer free.

Tbh i really hate that this happens, at least with the older servers the ping wasn't that bad would probably be getting around 100 ping flat but i find 140 makes it really hard to efficiently play certain champions

+1

North American companies seem to neglect the fact that the region they classify as Latin America also have English speaking countries. The ping for me on LA servers is far better and I also would love for their to be additional language options.
